articles.headline: Goldman and Investors to Put $3 Billion Into Fund
articles.snippet: Goldman Sachs and a group of investors are injecting $3 billion of capital into one of its flailing hedge funds.
articles.abstract: Goldman Sachs and a group of investors are injecting $3 billion of capital into one of its flailing hedge funds.
articles.lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs announced yesterday that it along with a group of investors would inject $3 billion into the firmâ€™s Global Equity Opportunities Fund, a flailing quantitative hedge fund that lost about 30 percent of its value in a week.
